title: NSA Doval holds talk with Iran's NSC Secretary, affirms India's interest in development of Chabahar port
description:
NSA Doval holds talk with Iran's NSC Secretary, affirms India's interest in development of Chabahar port The Iranian representative stressed that Iran and India, as two ancient civilisations, share deep-rooted ties and vast potential for political and economic collaboration.
